line.originaltext: 1 cup quick cooking oats
3/4 cup flaked coconut
1 cup all-purpose flour
1 teaspoon baking soda
1 cup white sugar
1/2 cup butter
1 tablespoon golden syrup
2 tablespoons boiling water
Mix oats, flour, sugar and coconut together.
line.annotation: combine({ing0, ing1, ing2, ing4}, ing8, "mixed dry stuff", "mix")

line.originaltext: In a small saucepan over low heat, melt the syrup and butter together.
In a small saucepan over low heat, melt the syrup and butter together.
In a small saucepan over low heat, melt the syrup and butter together.
line.annotation: cook(ing9, t0, ing10, "melted butter and syrup", "melt together")

line.originaltext: Mix the soda and the boiling water and add to the melted butter and syrup.
Mix the soda and the boiling water and add to the melted butter and syrup.
line.annotation: combine({ing10, ing11}, ing12, "mixed hot stuff", "add soda and water to the melted butter and syrup")

line.originaltext: Add butter mixture to the dry ingredients.
line.annotation: combine({ing12, ing8}, ing13, "final mixture", "add mixed hot stuff to the dry ingredients")

line.originaltext: Drop by teaspoons on greased cookie sheets (or baking paper).
line.annotation: create_tool(t1, "greased cookie sheets or baking paper")

line.originaltext: Drop by teaspoons on greased cookie sheets (or baking paper).
Drop by teaspoons on greased cookie sheets (or baking paper).
Drop by teaspoons on greased cookie sheets (or baking paper).
Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 18 to 20 minutes.
Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 18 to 20 minutes.
line.annotation: cook(ing14, t2, ing15, "baked biscuits", "Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 18 to 20 minutes")
